dublin_core.dcvalue: Advances in computing and telecommunications have resulted in the availability of a range of online tools for use in pathology training and quality assurance The majority focus on either enabling pathologists to examine and diagnose cases or providing image archives that serve as reference material Limited emphasis has been placed on analysing the diagnostic process used by pathologists to reach a diagnosis and using this as a resource for improving diagnostic performance
BMC medical informatics and decision making
Development and preliminary evaluation of the VPS ReplaySuite: a virtual double-headed microscope for pathology.
